amendment.description: to require the Department of Education to participate in the long-term child development study authorized under the Children's Health Act of 2000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3146 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3146 proposed by Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S5345-5348; text: CR S5345) to require the Department of Education to participate in the long-term child development study authorized under the Children's Health Act of 2000.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3146 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3146 proposed by Senator Clinton.
